definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]
erhua variant of 轉軸|转轴[zhuan4 zhou2]

sentences.english: The main rotary shaft can be simultaneously fixed with a plurality of circular discs with self rotation shafts.
sentences.chinese: 主转轴上可同时固定多个带自转轴的圆盘。

sentences.english: The main rotary shaft can be simultaneously fixed with a plurality of circular discs with self rotation shafts.
sentences.chinese: 主转轴上可同时固定多个带自转轴的圆盘。

sentences.english: The hydraulic pressure revolution axis design thickens the plate, the anti-collision, is not easy to distort.
sentences.chinese: 液压转轴设计加厚板材，抗碰撞，不易变形。

sentences.english: The axis of rotation and its support are part of the central pedestal.
sentences.chinese: 旋转轴和它的支撑结构是中央操作台的一部分。

sentences.english: The North Pole is the spot on Earth’s globe that marks the northern end of an imaginary stick Earth spins around.
sentences.chinese: 北极是地球表面与假想的自转轴相交的北交点。

sentences.english: The shape of the molecule of the compound is in chain configuration having diad axis.
sentences.chinese: 该化合物分子为链状结构，具有2次旋转轴。

sentences.english: The energy in the wind turns two or three propeller-like blades around a rotor.
sentences.chinese: 风力推动固定在转轴上两三个像推进器一样的叶片。

sentences.english: But it turns once on its axis in 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 但是它绕着自转轴运转一周需要24小时。

sentences.english: The starter drive gear is mounted on the armature shaft.
sentences.chinese: 启动机驱动安装在电枢转轴上的齿轮。

sentences.english: The research then focuses on the mechanism which a pivot can resist external torques at arbitrary position.
sentences.chinese: 其次探讨当此转轴静止时抵抗外加扭矩之机制。

sentences.english: EDIT: Later I understood that G2A compresses dynamic range significantly.
sentences.chinese: 随后我意识到活动的转轴贡献很大。

sentences.english: A method of infrared short range telemetry for torque measurement of rotating shaft is stated.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种对旋转轴扭矩测试的红外近程遥测法。

sentences.english: The top of the outer pipe is furled through a movable rotating shaft.
sentences.chinese: 外管顶部通过活动转轴收合。

sentences.english: Commonly, hard disks have several disk platters mounted on a single central spindle.
sentences.chinese: 通常硬盘有几个安放在一根中央转轴上的碟盘。

sentences.english: Hold the spinning Bicycle Wheel Gyroscope with its axis horizontal.
sentences.chinese: 手上拿著车轮回旋仪并保持它的转轴水平。

sentences.english: This conclusion is consistent with the hypothesis that the rotational axis of the minor planet has no precession.
sentences.chinese: 这个结论和小行星自转轴不进动的假定是一致的。
